channel.title: Commit on Dheepak
channel.description: Recent content in Commit on Dheepak

item.title: Git Commits
item.description: Some of the icons we can use in commit massages, to turn commits more graphical. Icon Keyword Equivalent Commits :tada: :tada: Initial Commit :rocket: :rocket: when implementing a new feature :hammer: :hammer: when fixing a bug or issue :art: :art: when refactor/improving code :construction: :construction: Work in progress :pencil: :pencil: Some small updates :truck: :truck: Move or rename resources Source: dev.
